# Artisan (Trait)
## Overview
**Artisan**: You spent time working under artisans, or your parents were artisans who were particularly skilled at their trade. You gain a +2 trait bonus on a single [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill (your choice). 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 59
